sql.if: order by wish_count desc nulls last

mapper.select: select i.item_id, item_name,summary,description,price,i.image,additional_info, c.name com_name, c.type com_type, category_name from item i JOIN company c on i.company_id = c.company_id JOIN category cat on i.category_id = cat.category_id where i.item_id = #{item_id}
select review, item_id, email, star, upload_date from item_comment i join member m on i.member_id = m.member_id where item_id=#{item_id} order by upload_date
insert into item_comment(item_comment_id, review, item_id, member_id, star, upload_date) values(seq_item_comment_id.nextval, '${review}', ${item_id}, ${member_id}, ${star}, SYSDATE)
mapper.insert: insert into cart(member_id, item_id, cart_id, quantity) values(#{member_id}, #{item_id}, SEQ_CART_ID.nextval, #{quantity})
